title: nA Donkadare
sahitya:
nA Donkadare ninna nAma Donko viTTala


caraNam 1    nadiyu Donku AdarEnu udaka Donke viTTala
    caraNam 2    hAvu Donku AdarEnu viSavu Donke viTTala
    caraNam 3    puSpa Donku AdarEnu parimaLa Donke viTTala
    caraNam 4    AkaLu Donku AdarEnu hAlu Donke viTTala
    caraNam 5    billu Donku AdarEnu bAna Donke viTTala
    caraNam 6    nAnu holeyanAdare nAma holeya viTTala
    caraNam 7    ajnanendu kAyo enna sujna purandara viTTala
